caption:
We investigate: a) Does dynamical structure in NDPs help in learning 
from demonstrations in imitation learning setups?; b) How well do NDPs perform on dynamic and 
quasi-static tasks in deep reinforcement learning setups compared to the baselines?; c) How sensitive 
is the performance of NDPs to different hyper-parameter settings?
